jobDescription: Candidates may apply to three positions maximum per internship cycle.  Before applying, please ensure that you have the following documents prepared: Cover Letter (Required)Resume (Required)Unofficial Transcript (Required)Letter of Recommendation (Optional) General Tips: Include all positions you are applying for in your cover letterApplicants applying for over three positions will not be reviewedYou must complete the applications for each position you wish to be considered forIncomplete applications will not be reviewed or consideredBe clear with what you wish to receive from the internshipWe will continue accepting applications until all positions have been filled Back to Internship DescriptionJob Posted by ApplicantPro
